author: mtosi
body:
#### PR description:
as suggested/requested by PF group at the UPSG workshop last week (@hatakeyamak @bendavid @JanFSchulte @jalimena),
the highPurity definition for the tracks in Phase2 is updated in order to consider *only* tracks w/ |eta| < 4.0
currently the highPurity is handle by the MultiTrackSelector, therefore such requirement can be easily integrated

it would be particularly useful to  apply such a selection already before the pattern recognition,
in order to avoid the waste of CPU resources on tracks which then are discarded

#### PR validation:
runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 21234.1 (w/ and w/o this update)
runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos
title: TRK POG Phase2 : limit highPurity tracks up to |eta| < 4.0
